Description: Beautiful Guitar for sale. I would list this as mint, but I would only do that if this guitar was brand new. Regardless, this Guitar sounds amazing and the neck is fantastic. That and the African Mahogany makes this an amazing guitar. I just do not play this one enough. Simply put, Suhr guitars are fantastic.I will consider all serious offers.From the Suhr Website about this guitar:The release of the Modern T Satin in 2016 marked the debut of an entirely new model for Suhr. Designed in conjunction with Andy Wood, the Modern T combines the 24 fret neck and sculpted heel joint of our Modern with the body shape of our Classic T, improving player comfort at the upper frets while preserving a more traditional design aesthetic. The Modern T Satin utilizes African Mahogany for both the body and the neck, resulting in an extremely responsive instrument that reacts to the subtlest dynamics. Equipped with Suhr SSH+ and SSV pickups and a 5-way selector switch, the Modern T Satin offers guitarists a wide array of humbucking and single coil tones; from high gain shred to glassy cleans. The Modern T Satin is a high performance workhorse with classic roots.
Title: Suhr Modern T Satin HH w/ African Mahoganny -2016 Limited Run
